mapper.insert: insert into thread (title, content, create_user_id, forum_id, create_time, modify_time) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{forumId}, #{createTime}, #{createTime});
mapper.select: select * from forum f where f.id = #{forumId}

select t.id thread_id, t.title thread_title, t.content thread_content, t.create_time thread_create_time, t.modify_time thread_modify_time, f.id forum_id, f.name forum_name, tu.username, ut.thread_num, up.post_num from thread t left join forum f on t.forum_id = f.id left join admin_user tu on tu.id = t.create_user_id left join ( select create_user_id, count(*) thread_num from thread group by create_user_id ) ut on ut.create_user_id = tu.id and tu.enabled = 1 left join ( select create_user_id, count(*) post_num from post group by create_user_id ) up on up.create_user_id = tu.id and tu.enabled = 1 where t.id = #{threadId}

select p.id post_id, u.id, u.username, ut.thread_num, up.post_num, p.create_time, p.floor, p.modify_time, p.content from post p left join thread t on t.id = p.thread_id left join admin_user u on u.id = p.create_user_id and u.enabled = 1 left join ( select create_user_id, count(*) thread_num from thread group by create_user_id ) ut on ut.create_user_id = u.id and u.enabled = 1 left join ( select create_user_id, count(*) post_num from post group by create_user_id ) up on up.create_user_id = u.id and u.enabled = 1 where t.id = #{threadId} order by p.floor
